source:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SEQ_00<tab>Pukty Piko appears to be beset with troubles.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SEQ_00<tab>* <var 1A 02 /var>Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.<var 1A 01 /var>

Pukty Piko semble avoir besoin d'aide.

source:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SEQ_01<tab>Word of your deeds has spread, and now citizens have turned to the emissaries of ardor and affection en masse for assistance with their assorted woes. Left alone to field this sudden influx of patrons, Pukty Piko seeks your aid in tidying up these poor people's problems. Speak with her to begin the arduous─though no doubt rewarding─task of giving these citizens a reason to smile this Valentione's Day.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SEQ_01<tab>Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Pukty Piko a été chargée de s'occuper de plusieurs personnes qui ont besoin de conseils pour écrire une lettre, et elle vous a demandé de lui donner un coup de main. Parlez-lui et choisissez la personne que vous désirez aider dans la liste qu'elle a créée à cet effet.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SEQ_02<tab>Pukty Piko appreciates all that you have done, but there are still others to whom you've yet to attend. Should you find the time, speak with Pukty again and assist those remaining...in the spirit of love!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SEQ_02<tab>Si vous avez du temps libre, n'hésitez par à revenir proposer votre aide à Pukty Piko autant de fois que nécessaire avant la fin des festivités. Il y aura toujours des lettres à rédiger avec <var 1A 02 /var>ardeur et affection<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I knew you would come. You've a marvelously convenient talent for appearing when we're in need, don't you? Anywho, trouble's afoot! Word has spread of our previous endeavors, which under normal circumstances would be cause for celebration, but not so today.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! La rumeur s'est répandue qu'un couple a été uni grâce à nos conseils, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_001<tab>We've been inundated with letters from across the realm, entreating our aid with all manner of vexations. Our fellows have left me here alone to field these pleas, but I can't see to all this by myself! Please, won't you assist me in bringing succor to the hearts of the weary?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_001<tab>Du coup, plusieurs personnes nous ont réclamé de l'aide pour écrire une lettre. Je suis chargée de cette mission, mais j'aimerais <var 1A 02 /var>vous<var 1A 01 /var> demander un coup de main, kupo.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_002<tab>I've made a tidy little list of those who have written to us. No need to see to their troubles in any particular order, mind you. Just, try not to let a request slip through the cracks, yes?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_002<tab>J'ai fais une liste. Je vous laisse choisir qui vous voulez aider, kupo.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_003<tab>Back again, I see! The heavy-hearted of the realm will rest easy knowing that you're on the case! Now then, which of these distraught Eorzeans will you assist this time?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_003<tab>Merci d'être <var 08 E905 ((revenue)) ((revenu)) /var> me donner un coup de main, kupo<var 1D /var>! Qui allons-nous aider, cette fois<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q1_000_000<tab>Whose dilemma will you see to?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q1_000_000<tab>Qui voulez-vous aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_001<tab>The emissary of penned passions.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_001<tab>Une messagère de l'amour

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_002<tab>The nameless adventurer.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_002<tab>Un aventurier débutant

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_003<tab>The winsome Padjal.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_003<tab>Une Padjale

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_004<tab>The one who dreams of the wider world.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_004<tab>Une jeune fille qui rêve d'aventures

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_005<tab>The one redolent of boughs.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_005<tab>Un être féerique

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_006<tab>On second thought, perhaps not...
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A1_000_006<tab>Annuler

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_010<tab>You would see to what plagues my heart? You are far too goodly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I confess that Aloyse's joyful union touched me in a way most unexpected─it sparked within me jealousy, of all things! For in her happiness, I saw reflected my own desires.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_010<tab>Coucou, c'est moi<var 1D /var>! Je dois avouer que j'étais un peu jalouse en voyant Aloyse et Ezolmile, alors je suis venue demander quelques conseils, moi aussi.♪
Bon, c'est pour une affaire totalement personnelle, hein...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_011<tab>Yes, 'tis true! I am here to speak of my own beloved. The man with whom I wish to spend all my days and nights! The very gentleman to whom I am betrothed: one Ser Hortefense!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_011<tab>C'est au sujet de... de mon, euh... de mon fiancé<var 1D /var>! Hortefense<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_012<tab>The festivities have run us both off our feet, leaving us not a spare moment to while away together as we once did. It vexes me terribly, yet I cannot speak of it to him. I would flush like a schoolgirl and tie my tongue into knots! Instead, I mean to pour my woes onto parchment.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_012<tab>On est tellement occupés pendant la fête de la Valention qu'on n'a pas du tout le temps de se parler. J'ai bien quelques inquiétudes, moi aussi, mais je me sentirais trop bête de lui en faire part de vive voix, alors j'ai décidé de lui écrire une lettre.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_013<tab>Oh, this explains a great deal! At first I couldn't understand what was upsetting you so, but now it's all clear as crystal to me. Right then, on to this letter! First, what style should she write it in?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_013<tab>Sur le coup, je me suis demandé quelle mouche l'avait piquée, mais maintenant que je repense aux conseils que nous avons donnés à Aloyse, je comprends mieux, kupo... À votre avis, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, sur quel ton devrait-elle écrire cette lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q2_000_000<tab>Comment Lisette devrait-elle écrire sa lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A2_000_001<tab>Fill it with prolix paragraphs and poems, as is her wont.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A2_000_001<tab>Avec sa verve habituelle

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A2_000_002<tab>Keep it simple and straightforward.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A2_000_002<tab>De façon naturelle

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_014<tab>And how should she word her vexations?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_014<tab>Et comment devrait-elle lui parler de ses inquiétudes, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q3_000_000<tab>Comment devrait-elle parler de ses inquiétudes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A3_000_001<tab>Forthrightly!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A3_000_001<tab>Avec franchise

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A3_000_002<tab>Be coy about them.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A3_000_002<tab>À mots couverts

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_015<tab>There! 'Tis done. For better or worse, the missive is penned.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_015<tab>Ouf<var 1D /var>! Ça y est, j'ai fini d'écrire ma lettre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_016<tab>And all that remains is its delivery, which I will attend to right away!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_016<tab>Je vais la livrer de ce pas, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_017<tab>Goodness me... No sooner had Ser Hortefense read your letter than he made a beeline for the nearest door to race to your side, Lisette! It was all I could do to keep him from stampeding through the streets. A small miracle he had the presence of mind to even hold a pen.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_017<tab>Lisette<var 1D /var>! Hortefense voulait courir te retrouver après avoir lu ta lettre<var 1D /var>! J'ai eu beaucoup de mal à lui faire écrire une réponse, kupo...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_018<tab>...It says he has been fretting over the same things as I have! In which case, why not come to me sooner? Honestly! He also writes that we shall sit down for a proper meal once Valentione's Day has come and gone, so I suppose there's no sense in holding it over his head... Although I ought to!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_018<tab>Il dit qu'il pensait la même chose que moi<var 1D /var>! Dans ce cas, c'est lui qui aurait dû prendre les devants pour m'en parler<var 1D /var>! Incroyable... Bon, au moins, il me propose d'aller dîner en tête-à-tête après les festivités, alors je veux bien lui pardonner.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_019<tab>Ahem. Well! That settles my affairs, I should say. My deepest, most sincere gratitude for your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You've conducted yourself with the diligence and sagacity befitting an emissary of affection. Now go forth and bestow your romantic wisdom upon those in need!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_019<tab>Euh... hum hum<var 1D /var>!
En tout cas, merci pour vos conseils<var 1D /var>!♪
J'espère que vous continuerez à aider plein de gens comme ça<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_020<tab>“Why do you dance around the issue at hand? Be plain with me or I will never understand”... Heavens, perhaps it would have been wiser to be more forthcoming about my issues.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_020<tab>Il dit que je devrais lui parler de toutes mes inquiétudes sans faire de manières... J'aurais sans doute dû être plus franche et naturelle...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_021<tab>Well, irrespective of this noncommittal answer I've received, I am grateful to you for advising me in this matter.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_LISETTE_000_021<tab>Bon ben, merci d'avoir essayé de m'aider, en tout cas...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_025<tab>We of the Adventurers' Guild seek to post a letter to our guildmaster, Mother Miounne.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_025<tab>Mes amis et moi voulons écrire une lettre à Miounne, de la guilde des aventuriers.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_026<tab>Though we're yet an untrained and unblooded passel of adventurers, it still grieves us tremendously to admit that we sought her aid in a task we bungled not several nights gone.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_026<tab>Nous manquons encore un peu d'expérience dans ce métier. J'ai honte de l'avouer, mais nous avons échoué dans une mission que Miounne nous avait confiée, et elle nous a aidés à nous en sortir...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_027<tab>We fear this blunder of ours will lower us in her estimation so abominably that we may never work again. We are determined to set this all to rights, but the question is how? What words will move Mother Miounne so that she will not see us as the lumbering dolts who stepped in it?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_027<tab>Nous espérons qu'elle nous donnera quand même encore du travail. Auriez-vous quelques conseils à nous procurer pour écrire cette lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_028<tab>Oh, that is a pickle! Count yourself lucky, though, for you're in the presence of a renowned adventurer, one who most assuredly understands well the problem you face. So, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? What advice can you impart to our flustered friends?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_028<tab>Je vois, kupo...
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, que devraient-ils dire à Miounne pour commencer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q4_000_000<tab>Que devraient-ils écrire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A4_000_001<tab>Show contrition and gratitude in equal measure.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A4_000_001<tab>S'excuser et la remercier

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A4_000_002<tab>Tell her that, barring this gaffe, you're sensational adventurers.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A4_000_002<tab>Vendre leurs mérites

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_029<tab>And what would convince this Mother Miounne to provide them with more work?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_029<tab>Et que devraient-ils dire pour l'inciter à leur confier du travail, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q5_000_000<tab>Que devraient-ils écrire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A5_000_001<tab>That failure is a novice's best learning tool.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A5_000_001<tab>Qu'ils ont appris de leurs erreurs

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A5_000_002<tab>That you would do anything to make up for your previous mishap.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A5_000_002<tab>Qu'ils sont prêts à tout pour se rattraper

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_030<tab>Here, 'tis writ at last.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_030<tab>Voilà<var 1D /var>! Nous avons terminé d'écrire la lettre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_031<tab>Then I shall see to its safe and expedient delivery!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_031<tab>Je vais tout de suite la livrer, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_032<tab>Pardon my tardiness. Miounne was kind enough to set out tea for me, and I could hardly refuse such an offer. It warmed my heart, to see such munificence! And, now that I reflect on it, such hospitality too is one form of love, isn't it. But I digress, what does Miounne write?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_032<tab>Miounne m'a offert une tasse de thé. Ça m'a donné chaud au cœur, kupo... C'est une marque d'affection, ça aussi<var 1D /var>? Tenez, voici sa réponse, kupo...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_033<tab>What a relief it is to read this! She has seen how steadfast our convictions to the guild are. By hook or by crook, we shall not disappoint her! I, for one, am afire with determination!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_033<tab>Ouf<var 1D /var>! Elle dit qu'elle apprécie notre attitude et qu'elle nous confiera bientôt une autre mission<var 1D /var>! Nous redoublerons d'efforts pour ne pas la décevoir, cette fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_034<tab>Your advice has rung true indeed. Thank you for your wisdom. We shan't forget it!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_034<tab>Merci beaucoup pour votre aide<var 1D /var>! Et que la chance vous accompagne dans vos propres aventures<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_035<tab>Though she commends us on our ambition and zeal, she worries that we put our lives at risk by attempting tasks which exceed our abilities. I cannot deny the truth of what she says. Well, I'm decided─“circumspection” shall be our watchword going forward!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_035<tab>Elle dit qu'elle apprécie notre enthousiasme, mais qu'un excès de confiance peut s'avérer fatal dans notre métier... Elle a raison. Nous devrons faire beaucoup plus attention, désormais.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_036<tab>You were wise to advise us as you did. I thank you for your help.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ADVENTURER04467_000_036<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, merci pour vos conseils. Au revoir.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>Fancy seeing you here! And fancier still that you are the one to assist me. My conundrum is that, as ever, my brother and I are concerned for Kan<var 1F /var>E's well-being. We thought to write her, but I know not what to say, and A<var 1F /var>Ruhn has lifted not a digit to help.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>C'est vous qui allez me conseiller<var 1D /var>? Bon...
Je veux écrire une lettre à ma sœur, Kan-E. J'en ai discuté avec mon frère, et il m'a demandé de la rédiger.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_041<tab>I would ask her to be mindful of her health, but does that not sound rather...fussy? Even more so when couched in “dearest sisters” and formal prose! Though I suppose Kan<var 1F /var>E is both formal and fussy herself...
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_041<tab>Comme vous le savez, Kan-E a de lourdes res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés et est ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment occupée. J'aimerais qu'elle essaie de souffler un peu de temps en temps, mais ça me ferait bizarre de le lui dire directement, alors j'ai pensé que je pourrais profiter du festival pour le faire par écrit.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_100_041<tab>What is more, I haven't much practice in the ways of penning properly worded missives. My sister is, as I mentioned, a touch on the fussy side, and holds manners and decorum in high regard. Little doubt that she will read my words with a rather critical eye.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_100_041<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je dois bien avouer que je n'ai pas du tout l'habitude de cet exercice, et ma sœur est tellement sérieuse et protocolaire que j'hésite un peu sur la forme, alors j'aurais besoin de vos lumières.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_042<tab>You speak of Kan<var 1F /var>E<var 1F /var>Senna, the Elder Seedseer? She is revered among our kind! To think I will soon be delivering a letter to her...what an honor! But enough about me─we're here for Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how do you think she should go about this?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_042<tab>Gloups<var 1D /var>! Quelle pression, kupo... Dame Kan-E-Senna est une personne éminente, et nous autres Mogs ne savons que trop bien qu'il vaut mieux ne pas contrarier sa sœur cadette ici présente, kupo... À votre avis, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, dans quel style devrait-elle écrire cette lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q6_000_000<tab>Comment Raya-O-Senna devrait-elle écrire sa lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A6_000_001<tab>No need to stand on ceremony─be frank about your concern!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A6_000_001<tab>Dans un style familier, puisqu'elles sont sœurs

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A6_000_002<tab>Show that you're serious by observing proper letter-writing etiquette.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A6_000_002<tab>Dans un style soutenu malgré leur lien de parenté

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_043<tab>Very well, but who should we say this letter is from? Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna may be the one composing it, but it was both her and her brother who meant to ask after her well-being. Hmmm... What are your thoughts?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_043<tab>Si j'ai bien compris, elle en a discuté avec son frère, mais il lui a demandé de rédiger la lettre, kupo. Comment devrait-elle la signer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q7_000_000<tab>Comment devrait-elle signer sa lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A7_000_001<tab>It should be from the person who wrote it.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A7_000_001<tab>De son propre nom uniquement

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A7_000_002<tab>It should be from both her and her brother.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A7_000_002<tab>De leurs deux noms

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_044<tab>There, I have finished. Might I entrust its delivery to you?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_044<tab>Voilà, je crois que ça ira.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_045<tab>Why of course! And away I go, kupo!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_045<tab>Je vais livrer cette lettre sur-le-champ, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_046<tab>The Elder Seedseer is a wonderful woman, as many have said. She saw how nervous I was and put me at my ease immediately! Your sister is lovely indeed.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_046<tab>J'étais un peu stressée de rencontrer dame Kan-E-Senna en personne, mais elle était aussi gentille qu'on le raconte, kupo...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_047<tab>I am glad to hear it. Let us see how she replies. Hm... She applauds me for the maturity I show in writing her, and says that as an older sister, she could not be more proud. What a curious response! I ask her to watch her health, and she commends me on my maturity?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_047<tab>Elle me dit qu'elle est fière de voir à quel point sa petite sœur a bien grandi... Je lui conseille de souffler un peu, et elle me félicite<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_048<tab>Strange as this answer is, it seems our words of worry have gotten through to her, thankfully. Though I was initially reluctant, I am glad we wrote her. My heart is lighter knowing she is well. Your assistance in these family matters is much appreciated.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_048<tab>En tout cas, je crois que le message est passé. Ce genre d'échange est un peu gênant, mais ça peut être bien de temps en temps... Je vous remercie <var 08 E905 ((toutes)) ((tous)) /var> les deux pour votre aide. Au revoir.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_049<tab>And I am glad to hear it. Now let's see how she replies. Oh, this is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> what I expected to receive. Though she acknowledges our concern for her health, she prattles on about this, that, and the other thing, lecturing me all the while about “proper postal decorum”...
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_049<tab>Ce n'est pas du tout la réponse à laquelle je m'attendais. Elle a compris que je m'inquiète pour elle, mais elle me fait plein de remarques pointilleuses...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_050<tab>Oh well. 'Twas a worthy attempt. While I had hoped for a different response, I am grateful for your help all the same. If you will excuse me.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_RAYAOSENNA_000_050<tab>Enfin bon, peu importe. Je ne vais pas vous déranger plus longtemps.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_055<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's lovely to see you again after all this time. I want you to know that I've been keeping to your advice, and am training day in and day out. I'm hopeful that soon I'll be able to take to the open road!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_055<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je suis tellement contente de vous revoir<var 1D /var>! J'ai suivi vos conseils, et je continue à m'entraîner durement tous les jours pour devenir une aventurière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_056<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>. My name's Elyne, and it is an honor to meet one such as yourself. For you see, I've dreams of becoming an adventurer too. Oh, to think of all that you have seen, all the lands you have walked... How incredible!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_056<tab>Enchantée, je m'appelle Elyne... Je suis tellement contente de pouvoir rencontrer <var 08 E905 ((une aventurière)) ((un aventurier)) /var> comme vous<var 1D /var>! Je m'entraîne durement pour en devenir une, moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_057<tab>But as for why I'm here today, well...I want to write a letter to Kupka Kupp, to thank him for his support. Whenever I feel low, like I want to give up on my dream of seeing the world, Kupka is there for me to lift my spirits.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_057<tab>J'ai un service à vous demander... J'aimerais envoyer une lettre à ce cher Kupka Kupp qui a toujours été là pour me réconforter quand j'étais sur le point d'abandonner. Je veux lui montrer que je pense à lui.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_058<tab>A message for Kupka Kupp, hm? So, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? How do you think she should start it?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_058<tab>Une lettre pour Kupka Kupp<var 1D /var>? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, à votre avis, comment devrait-elle commencer, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q8_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q8_000_000<tab>Comment Elyne devrait-elle commencer sa lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A8_000_001<tab>Thank him for all his encouragement.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A8_000_001<tab>En le remerciant pour tous ses efforts

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A8_000_002<tab>Urge him to take time for himself during this busy season.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A8_000_002<tab>En compatissant de le savoir débordé

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_059<tab>And how should she finish the letter?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_059<tab>Et comment devrait-elle finir, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q9_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q9_000_000<tab>Comment devrait-elle finir sa lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A9_000_001<tab>Remind him not to overwork himself.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A9_000_001<tab>En lui demandant de ne pas trop travailler

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A9_000_002<tab>Support him in his endeavors as he supports you in yours.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A9_000_002<tab>En souhaitant leur réussite mutuelle

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_060<tab>I've taken your words to heart. I only hope this letter is enough to show Kupka how much he means to me.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_060<tab>Ça y est<var 1D /var>! J'ai fini d'écrire ma lettre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_061<tab>I'll make sure it reaches the right hands! Or paws, rather.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_061<tab>Je vais tout de suite l'apporter à Kupka Kupp, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_062<tab>If only you could have seen the look on Kupka's face when I told him who had written him. He couldn't stop twirling through the air! It was adorable, but don't tell him I said that. He was so touched, he managed to find time between his many deliveries to craft a reply, which I have here.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_062<tab>Quand j'ai dit à Kupka Kupp que j'avais une lettre de la part d'Elyne, il a bondi de joie, kupo<var 1D /var>! Il s'est dépêché d'écrire sa réponse entre deux livraisons.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_063<tab>He really was happy to receive my letter, wasn't he! He tells me he can feel my gratitude and love for him in every word I wrote. As wonderful as it is to talk with him in person, correspondence like this can be rather fun, too.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_063<tab>Il dit qu'il a été touché par mon message plein d'affection et me remercie. Je suis toujours contente de lui parler, mais j'avoue que s'échanger des lettres a un charme tout particulier.

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_064<tab>I'm more motivated than ever to continue my training now. Thank you so much for the advice on my letter, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. And thank you, Pukty Piko, for delivering it to Kupka!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_064<tab>Sa réponse m'a remplie de courage<var 1D /var>! Je vais retourner m'entraîner<var 1D /var>! Merci beaucoup à vous deux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_065<tab>Oh, he writes me to apologize, saying that he never meant to cause me worry. An apology is the last thing I wanted from him. I think he might have misunderstood the intentions of my letter.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_065<tab>Il me dit qu'il est désolé de m'avoir causé du souci... Ce n'était pas du tout mon intention. J'espère qu'il ne s'inquiète pas pour moi, maintenant...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_066<tab>Well, we'll speak soon enough and I'll straighten all this out. Thank you for taking the time to help me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Farewell!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_ELYNE_000_066<tab>En tout cas, merci de m'avoir aidée<var 1D /var>! J'espère qu'on se reverra bientôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_070<tab>Hm? I didn't even notice this letter until just now, kupo! It must have slipped into my stack right under my nose─which is something of an astonishment, actually, as its wonderful scent is hard to miss! Let's see, who is it for... Oh! Why, it's addressed to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_070<tab>J'ai trouvé une lettre qui semble vous être adressée, kupo. Je ne sais pas comment elle est arrivée ici, mais elle dégage une douce odeur florale...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_071<tab>(-Faerie King's Letter-)I know very well the fun you're having right now─without me! Considering your tendency to be cold and cruel and <var 1A 02 /var>heartless<var 1A 01 /var>, it wouldn't surprise me in the least if I were to learn you've forgotten all about me.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_071<tab>(-Lettre du Monarque féerique-)Tu sembles bien t'amuser, mon petit arbrisseau, mais connaissant le sans-cœur que tu es, je parie que tu as com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment oublié ta jolie branchette<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_072<tab>(-Faerie King's Letter-)Why, oh why must <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> be the one writing <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!? Your beautiful branch is deserving of much more attention than you deem fit to provide! How mean and terrible and <var 1A 02 /var>rude<var 1A 01 /var> you are, sapling!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_072<tab>(-Lettre du Monarque féerique-)Tu pourrais me montrer ton affection de temps en temps, tout de même<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_073<tab>Oh my, aren't they a─ Ahem, sprightly one. I don't know who sent this to you, suffice it to say that whoever it is will be <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> displeased if they don't receive a response. Perhaps it's best to pen one now, while you're here. So, who shall we make your letter out to?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_073<tab>Je ne sais pas qui a écrit cette lettre, mais j'ai l'impression que c'est quelqu'un qu'il vaut mieux ne pas ignorer, kupo... Je crois que vous devriez rédiger votre réponse tout de suite, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... À qui faut-il l'adresser, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q10_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q10_000_000<tab>À qui adresser la lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A10_000_001<tab>Dearest Titania, fair ruler of the fae!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A10_000_001<tab>Votre Majesté Titania

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A10_000_002<tab>To my beautiful branch, Feo Ul!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A10_000_002<tab>Feo, ma jolie branchette

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_074<tab>And how will you express your adoration for them?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_074<tab>Et comment allez-vous lui montrer votre affection, kupo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q11_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_Q11_000_000<tab>Comment montrer votre affection<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A11_000_001<tab>Attach flowers and chocolate to your letter.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A11_000_001<tab>En glissant une fleur et un chocolat dans la lettre

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A11_000_002<tab>Remind them that they are always in your heart.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_A11_000_002<tab>En lui assurant que vous ne l'avez pas oubliée

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>Having groveled sufficiently onto the parchment, you seal your letter to the faerie king.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>Vous avez écrit une lettre au Monarque féerique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_076<tab>Now then, wait here while I... Oh my! The letter, it seems to be delivering itself, kupo! Stop. Stop, I say! Don't make me come after you! Oh bother... Wait for me, you silly thing. Wait for meee!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_076<tab>Kupopo<var 1D /var>! La lettre s'est envolée<var 1D /var>! Je vais la rattraper, kupo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_077<tab>Despite my best efforts to keep up, I lost the blasted thing somewhere out in the Twelveswood! Then, as if this story needed to be any more peculiar, I discovered a similarly scented missive on the road back─and wouldn't you know, it's addressed to you!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_077<tab>Je ne sais pas où est passée votre lettre, mais j'en ai trouvé une autre qui dégage le même parfum fleuri que la première, kupo...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_078<tab>(-Faerie King's Letter-)I just knew my sweet little sapling could suss out who I was from the clues I planted in my letter! Your affection for me was writ so plainly in your last correspondence, I shall return it here, in kind. How could I do less!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_078<tab>(-Lettre du Monarque féerique-)Tu vois que tu peux quand tu veux, mon petit arbrisseau<var 1D /var>! Et puisque tu m'as montré autant d'affection, je vais faire de même en retour<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_079<tab>(-Faerie King's Letter-)My precious sapling, wherever your travels may take you, wherever the roads you walk lead, know that my heart goes with you. Every step of every path, be they through dungeons dank and dark or to mountain peaks magnificent, I am there, watching over you, always and forever.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_079<tab>(-Lettre du Monarque féerique-)Je veillerai toujours sur toi, mon mignon petit arbrisseau, peu importe où ton périple te mènera<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_080<tab>(-Faerie King's Letter-)Sweetest sapling, I am positively delighted to receive a message from you. Of that much, I can assure you.
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_080<tab>(-Lettre du Monarque féerique-)Ta jolie branchette était contente de recevoir une lettre de son petit arbrisseau, je ne le nierai pas...

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_081<tab>(-Faerie King's Letter-)And only that much. For as far as the contents of your letter are concerned, I am less than pleased. No, I am putting it too lightly. I am so far from pleased that I find myself incensed. Wrathful. Furious! You, sapling, should show your lovely branch the affection I so rightly deserve...
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_FEOUL_000_081<tab>(-Lettre du Monarque féerique-)Mais tu aurais pu y mettre un peu plus d'affection<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_085<tab>Your assistance has proven positively indispensable, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If you've the time and inclination, do come by again. There is always more to be done, after all!
target: TEXT_FESVLT803_04467_PUKTYPIKO_000_085<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'espère que je pourrai encore compter sur votre aide quand vous aurez le temps, kupo.
